   19: 
   20: -module(alloc_SUITE).
   21: -author('rickard.green@uab.ericsson.se').
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   24: -export([basic/1,
   25: 	 coalesce/1,
   26: 	 threads/1,
   27: 	 realloc_copy/1,
   28: 	 bucket_index/1,
   29: 	 bucket_mask/1,
   30: 	 rbtree/1,
   31: 	 mseg_clear_cache/1,
   32: 	 erts_mmap/1,
   33: 	 cpool/1,
   34:          set_dyn_param/1,
   35: 	 migration/1,
   36:          cpool_opt/1]).
   37: 
   38: %% Internal export
   39: -export([run_drv_case/2]).
   40: 
   41: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   42: 
   43: suite() ->
   44:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   45:      {timetrap, {minutes, 4}}].
   46: 
   47: all() -> 
   48:     [basic, coalesce, threads, realloc_copy, bucket_index,
   49:      set_dyn_param,
   50:      bucket_mask, rbtree, mseg_clear_cache, erts_mmap, cpool, migration,
   51:      cpool_opt].
   52: 
   53: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   54:     case test_server:memory_checker() of
   55: 	MC when MC =:= valgrind; MC =:= asan ->
   56: 	    %% No point testing own allocators under valgrind or asan.
   57: 	    {skip, "Memory checker " ++ atom_to_list(MC)};
   58: 	none ->
   59: 	    Config
   60:     end.
   61: 
   62: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   63:     ok.
   64: 
   65: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   66:     [{testcase, Case}|Config].
   67: 
   68: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   69:     erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config).
   70: 
   71: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   72: %%                                                                        %%
   73: %% Testcases                                                              %%
   74: %%                                                                        %%
   75: 
   76: basic(Cfg) -> drv_case(Cfg).
   77: coalesce(Cfg) -> drv_case(Cfg).
   78: threads(Cfg) -> drv_case(Cfg).
   79: realloc_copy(Cfg) -> drv_case(Cfg).
   80: bucket_index(Cfg) -> drv_case(Cfg).
   81: bucket_mask(Cfg) -> drv_case(Cfg).
   82: rbtree(Cfg) -> drv_case(Cfg).
   83: mseg_clear_cache(Cfg) -> drv_case(Cfg).
   84: cpool(Cfg) -> drv_case(Cfg).
   85: 
   86: migration(Cfg) ->
   87:     %% Enable test_alloc.
   88:     %% Disable driver_alloc to avoid recursive alloc_util calls
   89:     %% through enif_mutex_create() in my_creating_mbc().
   90:     drv_case(Cfg, concurrent, ["+MZe", "true", "+MRe", "false"]),
   91:     drv_case(Cfg, concurrent, ["+MZe", "true", "+MRe", "false", "+MZas", "ageffcbf"]),
   92:     drv_case(Cfg, concurrent, ["+MZe", "true", "+MRe", "false", "+MZas", "chaosff"]).
   93: 
   94: cpool_opt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   95:     {ok, PeerA, NodeA} = ?CT_PEER(["+Mue", "true", "+Mut", "true", "+Muacul", "de", "+Mucp", "@"]),
   96:     {cp, '@'} = get_cp_opt(NodeA, binary_alloc),
   97:     {cp, '@'} = get_cp_opt(NodeA, std_alloc),
   98:     {cp, '@'} = get_cp_opt(NodeA, ets_alloc),
   99:     {cp, '@'} = get_cp_opt(NodeA, fix_alloc),
  100:     {cp, '@'} = get_cp_opt(NodeA, eheap_alloc),
  101:     {cp, '@'} = get_cp_opt(NodeA, ll_alloc),
  102:     {cp, '@'} = get_cp_opt(NodeA, driver_alloc),
  103:     {cp, '@'} = get_cp_opt(NodeA, sl_alloc),
  104:     peer:stop(PeerA),
  105:     {ok, PeerB, NodeB} = ?CT_PEER(["+Mue", "true", "+Mut", "true", "+Muacul", "de", "+Mucp", ":"]),
  106:     {cp, 'B'} = get_cp_opt(NodeB, binary_alloc),
  107:     {cp, 'D'} = get_cp_opt(NodeB, std_alloc),
  108:     {cp, 'E'} = get_cp_opt(NodeB, ets_alloc),
  109:     {cp, 'F'} = get_cp_opt(NodeB, fix_alloc),
  110:     {cp, 'H'} = get_cp_opt(NodeB, eheap_alloc),
  111:     {cp, 'L'} = get_cp_opt(NodeB, ll_alloc),
  112:     {cp, 'R'} = get_cp_opt(NodeB, driver_alloc),
  113:     {cp, 'S'} = get_cp_opt(NodeB, sl_alloc),
  114:     peer:stop(PeerB),
  115:     {ok, PeerC, NodeC} = ?CT_PEER(["+Mue", "true", "+Mut", "true", "+Muacul", "de", "+Mucp", ":", "+MEcp", "H"]),
  116:     {cp, 'B'} = get_cp_opt(NodeC, binary_alloc),
  117:     {cp, 'D'} = get_cp_opt(NodeC, std_alloc),
  118:     {cp, 'H'} = get_cp_opt(NodeC, ets_alloc),
  119:     {cp, 'F'} = get_cp_opt(NodeC, fix_alloc),
  120:     {cp, 'H'} = get_cp_opt(NodeC, eheap_alloc),
  121:     {cp, 'L'} = get_cp_opt(NodeC, ll_alloc),
  122:     {cp, 'R'} = get_cp_opt(NodeC, driver_alloc),
  123:     {cp, 'S'} = get_cp_opt(NodeC, sl_alloc),
  124:     peer:stop(PeerC).
  125: 
  126: get_cp_opt(Node, Alloc) ->
  127:     AInfo = rpc:call(Node, erlang, system_info, [{allocator,Alloc}]),
  128:     {instance, 1, IList} = lists:keyfind(1, 2, AInfo),
  129:     {options, OList} = lists:keyfind(options, 1, IList),
  130:     lists:keyfind(cp, 1, OList).
  131:     
  132: 
  133: erts_mmap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  134:     case {os:type(), mmsc_flags()} of
  135: 	{{unix,_}, false} ->
  136: 	    [erts_mmap_do(SCO, SCRPM, SCRFSD)
  137: 	     || SCO <-[true,false], SCRFSD <-[1234,0], SCRPM <- [true,false]];
  138: 	{{unix,_}, Flags} ->
  139: 	    {skipped, Flags};
  140: 	{{SkipOs,_},_} ->
  141: 	    {skipped,
  142: 		   lists:flatten(["Not run on "
  143: 				  | io_lib:format("~p",[SkipOs])])}
  144:     end.
  145: 
  146: %% Check if there are ERL_FLAGS set that will mess up this test case
  147: mmsc_flags() ->
  148:     case mmsc_flags("ERL_FLAGS") of
  149: 	false -> mmsc_flags("ERL_ZFLAGS");
  150: 	Flags -> Flags
  151:     end.
  152: mmsc_flags(Env) ->
  153:     case os:getenv(Env) of
  154: 	false -> false;
  155: 	V ->
  156:             case string:find(V, "+MMsc") of
  157:                 nomatch -> false;
  158:                 SubStr -> Env ++ "=" ++ SubStr
  159:             end
  160:     end.
  161: 
  162: erts_mmap_do(SCO, SCRPM, SCRFSD) ->
  163:     %% We use the number of schedulers + 1 * approx main carriers size
  164:     %% to calculate how large the super carrier has to be
  165:     %% and then use a minimum of 100 for systems with a low amount of
  166:     %% schedulers
  167:     Schldr = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online)+1,
  168:     SCS = max(round((262144 * 6 + 3 * 1048576) * Schldr / 1024 / 1024),100),
  169:     O1 = ["+MMscs" ++ integer_to_list(SCS),
  170: 	"+MMsco" ++ atom_to_list(SCO),
  171: 	"+MMscrpm" ++ atom_to_list(SCRPM)],
  172:     Opts = case SCRFSD of
  173: 	       0 -> O1;
  174: 	       _ -> O1 ++ ["+MMscrfsd"++integer_to_list(SCRFSD)]
  175: 	   end,
  176:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(Opts),
  177:     F = fun() ->
  178:                 SI = erlang:system_info({allocator,erts_mmap}),
  179:                 {default_mmap,EM} = lists:keyfind(default_mmap, 1, SI),
  180:                 {supercarrier,SC} = lists:keyfind(supercarrier, 1, EM),
  181:                 {sizes,Sizes} = lists:keyfind(sizes, 1, SC),
  182:                 {free_segs,Segs} = lists:keyfind(free_segs,1,SC),
  183:                 {total,Total} = lists:keyfind(total,1,Sizes),
  184:                 io:format("Expecting total ~w, got ~w~n", [SCS*1024*1024,Total]),
  185:                 Total = SCS*1024*1024,
  186: 
  187:                 {reserved,Reserved} = lists:keyfind(reserved,1,Segs),
  188:                 true = (Reserved >= SCRFSD),
  189: 
  190:                 case {SCO,lists:keyfind(os,1,EM)} of
  191:                     {true, false} -> ok;
  192:                     {false, {os,_}} -> ok
  193:                 end,
  194: 
  195:                 exit(ok)
  196:         end,
  197: 
  198:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(Node, F),
  199:     Result = receive {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, Rslt} -> Rslt end,
  200:     peer:stop(Peer),
  201:     Result.
  202: 
  203: 
  204: %% Test erlang:system_flag(erts_alloc, ...)
  205: set_dyn_param(_Config) ->
  206:     {_, _, _, AlcList} = erlang:system_info(allocator),
  207: 
  208:     {Enabled, Disabled, Others} =
  209:         lists:foldl(fun({sys_alloc,_}, {Es, Ds, Os}) ->
  210:                             {Es, [sys_alloc | Ds], Os};
  211: 
  212:                        ({AT, Opts}, {Es, Ds, Os}) when is_list(Opts) ->
  213:                             case lists:keyfind(e, 1, Opts) of
  214:                                 {e, true} ->
  215:                                     {[AT | Es], Ds, Os};
  216:                                 {e, false} ->
  217:                                     {Es, [AT | Ds], Os};
  218:                                 false ->
  219:                                     {Es, Ds, [AT | Os]}
  220:                             end;
  221: 
  222:                        (_, Acc) -> Acc
  223:                     end,
  224:                     {[], [], []},
  225:                     AlcList),
  226: 
  227:     Param = sbct,
  228:     lists:foreach(fun(AT) -> set_dyn_param_enabled(AT, Param) end,
  229:                   Enabled),
  230: 
  231:     lists:foreach(fun(AT) ->
  232:                           Tpl = {AT, Param, 12345},
  233:                           io:format("~p\n", [Tpl]),
  234:                           notsup = erlang:system_flag(erts_alloc, Tpl)
  235:                   end,
  236:                   Disabled),
  237: 
  238:     lists:foreach(fun(AT) ->
  239:                           Tpl = {AT, Param, 12345},
  240:                           io:format("~p\n", [Tpl]),
  241:                           {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  242:                               (catch erlang:system_flag(erts_alloc, Tpl))
  243:                   end,
  244:                   Others),
  245:     ok.
  246: 
  247: set_dyn_param_enabled(AT, Param) ->
  248:     OldVal = get_alc_param(AT, Param),
  249: 
  250:     Val1 = OldVal div 2,
  251:     Tuple = {AT, Param, Val1},
  252:     io:format("~p\n", [Tuple]),
  253:     ok = erlang:system_flag(erts_alloc, Tuple),
  254:     Val1 = get_alc_param(AT, Param),
  255: 
  256:     ok = erlang:system_flag(erts_alloc, {AT, Param, OldVal}),
  257:     OldVal = get_alc_param(AT, Param),
  258:     ok.
  259: 
  260: get_alc_param(AT, Param) ->
  261:     lists:foldl(fun({instance,_,Istats}, Acc) ->
  262:                         {options,Opts} = lists:keyfind(options, 1, Istats),
  263:                         {Param,Val} = lists:keyfind(Param, 1, Opts),
  264:                         {as,Strategy} = lists:keyfind(as, 1, Opts),
  265: 
  266:                         case {param_for_strat(Param, Strategy), Acc} of
  267:                             {false, _} -> Acc;
  268:                             {true, undefined} -> Val;
  269:                             {true, _} ->
  270:                                 Val = Acc
  271:                         end
  272:                 end,
  273:                 undefined,
  274:                 erlang:system_info({allocator, AT})).
  275: 
  276: param_for_strat(sbct, gf) -> false;
  277: param_for_strat(_, _) -> true.
  278: 
  279: 
  280: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  281: %%                                                                        %%
  282: %% Internal functions                                                     %%
  283: %%                                                                        %%
  284: 
  285: drv_case(Config) ->
  286:     drv_case(Config, one_shot, "").
  287: 
  288: drv_case(Config, Mode, NodeOpts) when is_list(Config) ->
  289:     case os:type() of
  290: 	{Family, _} when Family == unix; Family == win32 ->
  291:             %% ?CT_PEER(#{exec => {"/usr/local/bin/erl", ["-emu_type", "debug"]}})
  292:             TC = proplists:get_value(testcase, Config),
  293: 	    {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => ?CT_PEER_NAME(TC), args => NodeOpts}),
  294:             Result = erpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, run_drv_case, [Config, Mode]),
  295: 	    peer:stop(Peer),
  296: 	    Result;
  297: 	SkipOs ->
  298: 	    {skipped,
  299: 		   lists:flatten(["Not run on "
  300: 				  | io_lib:format("~p",[SkipOs])])}
  301:     end.
  302: 
  303: run_drv_case(Config, Mode) ->
  304:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  305:     CaseName = proplists:get_value(testcase,Config),
  306:     File = filename:join(DataDir, CaseName),
  307:     {ok,CaseName,Bin} = compile:file(File, [binary,return_errors]),
  308:     {module,CaseName} = erlang:load_module(CaseName,Bin),
  309:     print_stats(CaseName),
  310:     ok = CaseName:init(File),
  311: 
  312:     SlaveState = slave_init(CaseName),
  313:     case Mode of
  314: 	one_shot ->
  315: 	    Result = one_shot(CaseName);
  316: 
  317: 	concurrent ->
  318: 	    Result = concurrent(CaseName)
  319:     end,
  320: 
  321:     wait_for_memory_deallocations(),
  322:     print_stats(CaseName),
  323: 
  324:     true = erlang:delete_module(CaseName),
  325:     slave_end(SlaveState),
  326:     Result.
  327: 
  328: slave_init(migration) ->
  329:     A0 = case application:start(sasl) of
  330: 	     ok -> [sasl];
  331: 	     _ -> []
  332: 	 end,
  333:     case application:start(os_mon) of
  334: 	ok -> [os_mon|A0];
  335: 	_ -> A0
  336:     end;
  337: slave_init(_) -> [].
  338: 
  339: slave_end(Apps) ->
  340:     lists:foreach(fun (A) -> application:stop(A) end, Apps).
  341: 
  342: wait_for_memory_deallocations() ->
  343:     try
  344:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, deallocations)
  345:     catch
  346:         error:undef ->
  347:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
  348:             wait_for_memory_deallocations()
  349:     end.
  350: 
  351: print_stats(migration) ->
  352:     IFun = fun({instance,_,Stats}, {Regular0, Pooled0}) ->
  353:                    {mbcs,MBCS} = lists:keyfind(mbcs, 1, Stats),
  354:                    {sbcs,SBCS} = lists:keyfind(sbcs, 1, Stats),
  355: 
  356:                    Regular = MBCS ++ SBCS ++ Regular0,
  357:                    case lists:keyfind(mbcs_pool, 1, Stats) of
  358:                         {mbcs_pool,Pool} -> {Regular, Pool ++ Pooled0};
  359:                         false -> {Regular, Pooled0}
  360:                    end;
  361:               (_, Acc) ->
  362:                   Acc
  363:            end,
  364: 
  365:     Stats = erlang:system_info({allocator,test_alloc}),
  366:     {Regular, Pooled} = lists:foldl(IFun, {[], []}, Stats),
  367: 
  368:     {RegBlocks, RegCarriers} = summarize_alloc_stats(Regular, {0, 0}),
  369:     {PooledBlocks, PooledCarriers} = summarize_alloc_stats(Pooled, {0, 0}),
  370: 
  371:     io:format("Number of blocks  : ~p\n", [RegBlocks]),
  372:     io:format("Number of carriers: ~p\n", [RegCarriers]),
  373:     io:format("Number of pooled blocks  : ~p\n", [PooledBlocks]),
  374:     io:format("Number of pooled carriers: ~p\n", [PooledCarriers]);
  375: print_stats(_) ->
  376:     ok.
  377: 
  378: summarize_alloc_stats([{blocks,L} | Rest], {Blocks0, Carriers}) ->
  379:     Blocks = count_blocks([S || {_Type, S} <- L], Blocks0),
  380:     summarize_alloc_stats(Rest, {Blocks, Carriers});
  381: summarize_alloc_stats([{carriers, Count, _, _} | Rest], {Blocks, Carriers0}) ->
  382:     summarize_alloc_stats(Rest, {Blocks, Carriers0 + Count});
  383: summarize_alloc_stats([{carriers, Count} | Rest], {Blocks, Carriers0}) ->
  384:     summarize_alloc_stats(Rest, {Blocks, Carriers0 + Count});
  385: summarize_alloc_stats([_ | Rest], Acc) ->
  386:     summarize_alloc_stats(Rest, Acc);
  387: summarize_alloc_stats([], Acc) ->
  388:     Acc.
  389: 
  390: count_blocks([{count, Count, _, _} | Rest], Acc) ->
  391:     count_blocks(Rest, Acc + Count);
  392: count_blocks([{count, Count} | Rest], Acc) ->
  393:     count_blocks(Rest, Acc + Count);
  394: count_blocks([_ | Rest], Acc) ->
  395:     count_blocks(Rest, Acc);
  396: count_blocks([], Acc) ->
  397:     Acc.
  398: 
  399: one_shot(CaseName) ->
  400:     State = CaseName:start({1, 0, erlang:system_info(build_type)}),
  401:     Result0 = CaseName:run(State),
  402:     false = (Result0 =:= continue),
  403:     Result1 = handle_result(State, Result0),
  404:     CaseName:stop(State),
  405:     Result1.
  406: 
  407: 
  408: many_shot(CaseName, I, Mem) ->
  409:     State = CaseName:start({I, Mem, erlang:system_info(build_type)}),
  410:     Result1 = repeat_while(fun() ->
  411: 				   Result0 = CaseName:run(State),
  412: 				   handle_result(State, Result0)
  413: 			   end,
  414: 			   10*1000, I),
  415:     CaseName:stop(State),
  416:     flush_log(),
  417:     Result1.
  418: 
  419: concurrent(CaseName) ->
  420:     NSched = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  421:     Mem = (free_memory() * 3) div 4,
  422:     PRs = lists:map(fun(I) -> spawn_opt(fun() ->
  423: 						many_shot(CaseName, I,
  424: 							  Mem div NSched)
  425: 					end,
  426: 				       [monitor, {scheduler,I}])
  427: 		    end,
  428: 		    lists:seq(1, NSched)),
  429:     lists:foreach(fun({Pid,Ref}) ->
  430: 			  receive {'DOWN', Ref, process, Pid, Reason} ->
  431: 				  Reason
  432: 			  end
  433: 		  end,
  434: 		  PRs),
  435:     ok.
  436: 
  437: repeat_while(Fun, Timeout, I) ->
  438:     TRef = erlang:start_timer(Timeout, self(), timeout),
  439:     R = repeat_while_loop(Fun, TRef, I),
  440:     erlang:cancel_timer(TRef, [{async,true},{info,false}]),
  441:     R.
  442: 
  443: repeat_while_loop(Fun, TRef, I) ->
  444:     receive
  445: 	{timeout, TRef, timeout} ->
  446: 	    io:format("~p: Timeout, enough is enough.",[I]),
  447: 	    succeeded
  448:     after 0 ->
  449: 	    %%io:format("~p calls fun\n", [self()]),
  450: 	    case Fun() of
  451: 		continue -> repeat_while_loop(Fun, TRef, I);
  452: 		R -> R
  453: 	    end
  454:     end.
  455: 
  456: flush_log() ->
  457:     receive
  458: 	{print, Str} ->
  459: 	    io:format("~s", [Str]),
  460: 	    flush_log()
  461:     after 0 ->
  462: 	    ok
  463:     end.
  464: 
  465: handle_result(_State, Result0) ->
  466:     flush_log(),
  467:     case Result0 of
  468: 	{'EXIT', Error} ->
  469: 	    ct:fail(Error);
  470: 	{'EXIT', error, Error} ->
  471: 	    ct:fail(Error);
  472: 	{failed, Comment} ->
  473: 	    ct:fail(Comment);
  474: 	{skipped, Comment} ->
  475: 	    {skipped, Comment};
  476: 	{succeeded, ""} ->
  477: 	    succeeded;
  478: 	{succeeded, Comment} ->
  479: 	    {comment, Comment};
  480: 	continue ->
  481: 	    continue
  482:     end.
  483: 
  484: free_memory() ->
  485:     %% Free memory in MB.
  486:     try
  487: 	SMD = memsup:get_system_memory_data(),
  488:         TotFree = proplists:get_value(
  489:                     available_memory, SMD,
  490:                     proplists:get_value(free_memory, SMD) +
  491:                         proplists:get_value(cached_memory, SMD, 0) +
  492:                         proplists:get_value(buffered_memory, SMD, 0)
  493:                    ),
  494: 	TotFree div (1024*1024)
  495:     catch
  496: 	error : undef ->
  497: 	    ct:fail({"os_mon not built"})
  498:     end.
  499: 
  500: 
  501:
